attributes.action: stop sex offenders living  in the same area as the  victims
attributes.additional_details: please do something about sex offenders being bailed or released  from there petty sentence into the same area as there victims and family ... i know your going to say its against there human rights but think of the victims that have to see there abuser everyday and relive the horrors daily and  constant  reminders of what they where put threw .. victims should have rights too
